# Guitar Chords Sheet - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
A React + TypeScript + Vite web application for creating guitar chord sheets with lyrics.

## Technology Stack
- **Frontend:** React 18+ with TypeScript
- **Build Tool:** Vite
- **Styling:** CSS with A4 page layout simulation

## Key Features
- A4 format document editing with two-column layout
- Precise chord positioning above lyrics text
- Right-to-left language support (Hebrew)
- PDF export functionality

## Code Conventions
- Use TypeScript strict mode
- Use functional React components with hooks
- Follow ESLint and Prettier configurations
- Use CSS modules or styled-components for styling

## File Structure
- `src/components/` - React components
- `src/styles/` - CSS files
- `src/types/` - TypeScript type definitions
- `src/utils/` - Utility functions

## Development Commands
- `npm run dev` - Start development server
- `npm run build` - Build for production
- `npm run lint` - Run ESLint
- `npm run preview` - Preview production build
